page.title: 08HOUSING
page.content: There are over{7000 council owned houses in our area,the first being built in 1919.Although the council builds an average 60 houses a year there are still 1382 people on the housing list. The{styles of houses}built have changed in the last 50 years.Instead of large houses for big families smaller houses are now being built for single people and small families. Kirkcaldy also has{108 sheltered houses. 10% of local authority housing has been sold, the most popular being the more modern cottage type houses. There are well over{4000 privately {owned houses}in our area.Like the more modern council houses the private houses are now built in estates.
